TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartVerb extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager

summary.span: 提供使用户能在 Web 部件页面上执行操作的交互式用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Provides an interactive user interface (UI) element that enables users to perform actions on a Web Parts page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件谓词是交互式 UI 元素，通常由按钮或超链接表示，它们显示在使用 Web 部件控件的页面中。Web Parts verbs are interactive UI elements, typically represented by buttons or hyperlinks, that appear in pages that use Web Parts controls. 用户单击谓词以执行 Web 部件控件的常见 UI 操作，例如关闭 控件或关闭编辑显示模式 (与控件) 关联的特殊页面视图 。Users click verbs to carry out common UI actions for Web Parts controls, such as closing a control or closing the edit display mode (a special page view associated with the control). Web 部件控制集提供的所有标准谓词都与 Web 部件区域 ( 、 、 或 ) 或 Web 部件 、 、 或 (的) 控件 相关联。All standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set are associated with either a Web Parts zone (, , , or ) or a Web Parts control (, , , or ). 当标准谓词与某个区域关联时，它们的操作将应用于区域级别，并且谓词通常显示在区域的标头或表尾区域中。When the standard verbs are associated with a zone, their actions apply at the zone level, and the verbs usually appear in the zone's header or footer area. 下表列出了常见的区域级别谓词，并介绍了其操作。The following table lists the common zone-level verbs and describes their actions. |区域级别谓词Zone-level verb|操作Action| |----------------------|------------| |关闭谓词Close verb|与从类继承的区域一起使用 。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 隐藏区域的 UI，并且通常会将页面返回到它的正常浏览模式视图。Hides the UI for a zone and typically returns the page to its normal browse mode view.| |应用谓词Apply verb|与从类继承的区域一起使用 。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 应用用户已进行的更改。Applies changes that a user has made.| |确定谓词OK verb|与从类继承的区域一起使用 。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 具有应用和关闭谓词的组合效果;它应用更改并隐藏区域的 UI。Has the combined effect of the apply and close verbs; it applies changes and hides the zone's UI.| |取消谓词Cancel verb|与从类继承的区域一起使用 。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 取消用户所做的任何挂起的更改。Cancels any pending changes a user has made.| |添加谓词Add verb|与从类继承的区域一起使用 。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 将用户从控件目录中选择的控件添加到指定 区域。Adds a control that a user has selected from a catalog of controls to a specified zone.| |配置谓词Configure verb|与从类继承的区域一起使用 。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 打开一个视图，使用户能够配置现有连接。Opens a view to enable users to configure existing connections.| |断开连接谓词Disconnect verb|与从类继承的区域一起使用 。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 终止两个控件之间的现有连接。Terminates an existing connection between two controls.| 对于与控件相关联的标准谓词 ，它们的操作应用于控件本身 (或) 的子控件。As for the standard verbs that are associated with controls, their actions apply to the control itself (or to its child controls). 部件控件作为谓词的容器，用于管理谓词的呈现。The part control acts as a container for the verb and manages the rendering of the verb. 与部件控件关联的大多数标准谓词直接显示在标题栏或标题栏中的下拉谓词菜单中。Most standard verbs associated with part controls appear either directly in the title bar or in a drop-down verbs menu within the title bar. 这些谓词是直接显示在标头中还是出现在谓词菜单中取决于 属性; 默认情况下，谓词出现在谓词菜单中。Whether these verbs appear directly in the header or in a verbs menu is determined by the property; by default, the verbs appear in a verbs menu. 下表列出了与各个控件关联的常见谓词 ，并对其操作进行了说明。The following table lists common verbs associated with the various controls and describes their actions. |部件控制谓词Part control verb|操作Action| |-----------------------|------------| |最小化谓词Minimize verb|显示在区域中包含的每个服务器控件的谓词菜单中 。Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a zone. 将控件减少到最小表示形式，隐藏其 UI 中除还原谓词以外的所有内容。Reduces the control to a minimal representation, hiding everything in its UI except the restore verb.| |还原谓词Restore verb|显示在区域中包含的每个服务器控件的谓词菜单中 。Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a zone. 将最小化控件返回到其正常大小和视图。Returns a minimized control to its normal size and view.| |关闭谓词Close verb|显示在区域中包含的每个服务器控件的谓词菜单中 。Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a zone. 关闭控件并将其添加到页目录中，这意味着将从页中移除控件，但如果有正确设计的目录，用户可以重新打开关闭的控件并将其返回到页面。Closes a control and adds it to the page catalog, which means the control is removed from the page but, if there is a properly designed catalog, users can reopen the closed control and return it to the page.| |连接谓词Connect verb|如果页面处于连接显示模式，并且控件可以形成连接，则将显示在区域中包含的控件的谓词菜单中。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the page is in connect display mode and if the control can form connections. 打开连接用户界面，以便用户可以在控件之间创建连接。Opens a connection UI so that users can create a connection between controls.| |删除谓词Delete verb|如果控件是以编程方式添加到页中的，则显示在区域中包含的控件的谓词菜单中 ，而不是以持久性格式) (声明的。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the control was added to the page programmatically (rather than being declared in persistence format). 永久删除控件实例和任何关联的个性化设置数据，以便与关闭的控件不同，删除的实例永远无法还原到页面。Permanently deletes the control instance and any associated personalization data so that, unlike a closed control, the deleted instance can never be restored to the page.| |编辑谓词Edit verb|如果页面旨在允许编辑控件并且页处于编辑显示模式，则将显示在区域中包含的控件的谓词菜单中。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the page is designed to permit editing of controls and if the page is in edit display mode. 选择要编辑的控件并打开编辑 UI。Selects the control for editing and opens the editing UI.| |导出谓词Export verb|如果为导出启用了控件和应用程序，则在区域中包含的控件的谓词菜单中显示。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the control and application are enabled for export. 打开一个对话框，用户可以使用该对话框导出包含控件的序列化状态的说明文件。Opens a dialog box that enables users to export a description file that contains the serialized state of the control. 有关详细信息，请参见 属性。For details, see the property.| |帮助谓词Help verb|如果控件旨在提供帮助文件，则显示在区域中包含的控件的谓词菜单中。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the control is designed to provide a Help file. 启动提供控件帮助的页面。Launches a page that provides help for the control.| 除了随 Web 部件控件集一起提供的标准谓词，还可以创建自定义谓词。Along with the standard verbs that are provided with the Web Parts control set, you can also create custom verbs. 创建自定义谓词的常见方案是创建与控件相关联的谓词 。A common scenario for creating custom verbs is to create verbs associated with controls. 创建这些谓词时，默认情况下，它们将与标准谓词一起显示在谓词菜单上。When you create these verbs, by default they will appear on the verbs menu along with the standard verbs. 创建此类谓词的基本方法是从 类继承，以创建一个或多个自定义谓词。The basic approach for creating such verbs is to inherit from the class to create one or more custom verbs. 然后创建一个从基类继承的控件 ，并将自定义 对象添加到 集合中。Then create a control that inherits from the base class and add the custom objects to a collection. 然后，可以将此集合添加到 控件的集合，这将导致自定义谓词在运行时自动显示在控件的谓词菜单上。This collection can then be added to the collection of the control, which will cause the custom verbs to appear automatically on the control's verbs menu at run time. 与标准谓词一样，可以在控件上以编程方式访问自定义谓词 。As with the standard verbs, you can access the custom verbs programmatically on a control. Web 部件应用程序可以使用不是从类继承的服务器控件 ，如自定义控件、用户控件或 ASP.NET 控件。Web Parts applications can use server controls that do not inherit from the class, such as custom controls, user controls, or ASP.NET controls. 如果将这些服务器控件添加到 区域中，则会在运行时使用对象动态包装这些服务器控件， 使其能够作为运行时 控件运行。These server controls, if added to a zone, are dynamically wrapped with a object at run time, which enables them to function as run-time controls. 若要向不从类继承的服务器控件添加自定义谓词 ，则服务器控件必须实现该 接口并重写其 属性。To add custom verbs to a server control that does not inherit from the class, the server control must implement the interface and override its property. 创建谓词时，可以创建两种类型的关联事件处理程序，这些处理程序将在用户单击谓词时运行：服务器端事件处理程序 (服务器上运行的代码) ，以及客户端事件处理程序 (客户端浏览器中运行的代码) 。When you create a verb, you can create two types of associated event handlers that will run when a user clicks the verb: a server-side event handler (code that runs on the server), and a client-side event handler (code that runs in the client browser). 此外，可以为谓词定义自定义状态，这是向用户提供视觉提示的有用方法。Also, you can define custom states for verbs, which is a useful way to provide visual cues to users. 例如，你可以创建一个状态，指示已选择谓词，然后在 UI 中提供相应的更改，以通知用户已选择了谓词。For example, you could create a state indicating that a verb has been selected, and then provide appropriate changes in the UI to notify the user that the verb is already selected. 另一个有用的行为是禁用谓词;通过执行此操作，可以防止用户单击谓词（如果这样做），这可能会因应用程序的状态而有害或无效。Another useful behavior is the ability to disable verbs; by doing this, you can prevent users from clicking verbs if doing so would be harmful or ineffective based on the state of the application. 类不公开任何唯一方法; 它公开的方法都是基本方法的所有重写。The class does not expose any unique methods; its exposed methods are all overrides of base methods. 但是，它包含多个属性供开发人员了解。It does however contain a number of properties for developers to be aware of. 属性指示当前是否选择了谓词。The property indicates whether a verb is currently selected. 和 属性引用类中的相应处理程序 (如果任何) 用于客户端和服务器单击事件。The and properties refer to the respective handlers within the class (if any exist) for client and server click events. 当用户将鼠标指针放在 UI 中的谓词上时，属性包含的文本描述了工具提示中谓词的用途。The property contains text that describes the purpose of a verb in a ToolTip when users position a mouse pointer over the verb in the UI. 属性指示谓词的当前状态，它确定用户是否可以单击谓词并执行其操作。The property indicates the current status of a verb, which determines whether a user can click the verb and execute its action. 属性为 verb 对象提供唯一的 ID。The property provides a unique ID for the verb object. 属性包含一个图像的 URL，该图像可用于表示 UI 中用于表示默认呈现 (通常) 按钮或超链接的谓词。The property contains a URL to an image that can be used to represent a verb in the UI in place of the default rendering (typically a button or a hyperlink). 属性包含在 UI 中的谓词上直接显示的标签文本。The property contains the label text that appears directly on the verb in the UI. 重写的 属性确定谓词当前是否显示在 UI 中。The overridden property determines whether a verb is currently displayed in the UI. 谓词通常在 Web 部件应用程序中的不同时间隐藏或禁用;例如，仅当页面上存在适当的控件、设置和显示模式时，才会显示 (的专业谓词，如编辑谓词和连接谓词) ，以使这些谓词能够执行有意义的操作。Verbs are often hidden or disabled at different times in a Web Parts application; for example, specialty verbs (such as the edit verb and the connect verb) are displayed only when the appropriate controls, settings, and display modes exist on the page to enable those verbs to take meaningful action. 用于处理谓词的其他关键成员包括 方法，该方法是可重写的事件处理程序，用于谓词创建过程的自定义处理和 事件。Other key members for working with verbs include the method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义 对象，以及使用 方法将谓词添加到区域中包含的每个控件的谓词菜单的自定义区域 。The following code example shows how to create a custom object, and a custom zone that uses the method to add the verb to the verbs menu of each control contained in the zone. 此代码示例分为四个部分：There are four parts to the code example: - 一个源文件，其中包含一个简单的自定义 控件，用于显示某些文本。A source file that contains a simple custom control that displays some text. - 一个包含自定义对象的源文件 ，以及一个简单的自定义 区域，它重写 方法以将自定义谓词添加到 区域中的控件。A source file that contains a custom object, and a simple custom zone that overrides the method to add the custom verb to controls in the zone. - 包含自定义区域和自定义控件的网页 。A Web page that contains the custom zone and the custom control. - 此示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 此代码示例的第一部分包含创建 显示某些文本的简单控件的源代码。The first part of the code example contains source code that creates a simple control that displays some text. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译方法。This code example uses the dynamic compilation approach. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分包含用于创建自定义区域和自定义对象的源代码 。The second part of the example contains source code to create the custom zone and the custom object. 请注意，区域将重写 方法，以将自定义谓词添加到 区域中的任何控件。Note that the zone overrides the method to add the custom verb to any controls in the zone. 默认情况下，谓词添加到控件的谓词菜单。The verb is added by default to the verbs menu of the controls. 请注意，在自定义谓词的代码中，谓词的构造函数使用服务器单击处理程序，并且调用的方法会创建直接从类继承的任何控件的完整副本，并 将新创建的副本添加到相同区域。Note that, in the code for the custom verb, the constructor for the verb uses a server click handler, and that the method called creates a complete copy of any control that inherits directly from the class, adding the newly created copy to the same zone. 与代码示例的第一部分一样，此源代码必须编译，在此示例中，源文件被放入要动态编译的 App_Code 子文件夹中。Like the first part of the code example, this source code must be compiled, and in this example the source file was placed in an App_Code subfolder to be dynamically compiled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 此代码示例的第三部分是承载控件的网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the controls. 请注意， `Register` 页面顶部附近有一个指令，用于声明自定义控件的命名空间。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the page to declare the namespace of the custom controls. 未声明程序集，因为此示例使用动态编译。No assembly is declared because this example uses dynamic compilation. 自定义 控件在自定义区域中声明。The custom control is declared within the custom zone. 您还可以 在此区域中声明其他控件，并将自定义谓词添加到其谓词菜单中。You could also declare other controls in this zone, and the custom verb would be added to their verbs menus as well. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面，然后单击自定义控件上的谓词菜单 。Load the page in a browser, and click the verbs menu on the custom control. **复制 Web 部件**谓词应可见。The **Copy Web Part** verb should be visible. 单击该谓词，并注意该控件的副本将添加到该区域中。Click the verb, and note that a copy of the control is added to the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数 通过传入以下三个可能的参数之一来创建类的新实例：使用 id 字符串引用服务器端 click 事件处理程序，使用 id 字符串引用客户端 click 事件处理程序，或引用两种类型的 click 事件处理程序。The constructor creates a new instance of the class by passing in one of three possible parameters: a reference to a server-side click event handler with an ID string, a reference to a client-side click event handler with an ID string, or references to both types of click event handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: public WebPartVerb (string id, string clientClickHandler);

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and associates a client-side click event handler with the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类构造函数引用当用户在用户界面中单击谓词 (UI) 时调用的客户端事件处理程序。This class constructor refers to a client-side event handler to call when the user clicks a verb in the user interface (UI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类构造函数指的是用户在用户界面中单击谓词时要调用的客户端和服务器端 click 事件处理程序) (UI。This class constructor refers to both client-side and server-side click event handlers to call when the user clicks a verb in the user interface (UI).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示某个与自定义谓词相关联的状态当前是否处于活动状态或被选中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that some state associated with a custom verb is currently active or selected.

value.span: 如果与自定义谓词相关联的状态当前处于活动状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a state associated with a custom verb is currently active; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不与 Web 部件控件集提供的任何标准谓词一起使用。This property is not used with any of the standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set. 当它与自定义谓词一起使用，并且属性值设置为时 `true` ，谓词旁边会出现一个选中的复选框，指示谓词的活动状态。When it is used with custom verbs, and the property value is set to `true`, a selected check box appears next to the verb to indicate the active status of the verb. 此属性的目的是为开发人员提供一种方法，指示与谓词关联的某些自定义状态当前处于活动状态。The purpose of this property is to give developers a way of indicating that some custom state associated with a verb is currently active. 例如，假设开发人员创建了一个自定义谓词，该谓词可将区域中所有控件上的正文文本的可访问性目的) (的文本大小放大 。For example, suppose a developer creates a custom verb that enlarges the text size (for accessibility purposes) of the body text on all controls in a zone. 如果用户单击该谓词，则此属性值可以设置为，这会 `true` 导致选中的复选框显示在谓词菜单中的 " **增加文本大小** " 谓词旁边，这向用户指示与谓词关联的状态 (放大的文本) 处于活动状态。If a user clicks the verb, this property value could be set to `true`, which would cause a selected check box to appear next to the **Increase Text Size** verb in the verbs menu, indicating to users that the state associated with the verb (enlarged text) is active. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可获取或设置谓词说明，当用户将鼠标指针置于谓词上时，该谓词将显示为工具提示。Use this property to get or set a description of a verb that appears as a ToolTip when a user positions a mouse pointer over the verb. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在继承自的派生类中重写属性 。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源代码只显示自定义区域的代码部分和 重写属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 运行示例所需的代码的其余部分位于类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用谓词。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a verb is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用谓词，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the verb is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了谓词。Use this property to get or set a value indicating whether the verb is enabled. 能够在页面和控件生命周期中的给定点启用或禁用谓词很有用。It is useful to be able to enable or disable verbs at given points in the page and control life cycle. 例如，如果开发人员想要阻止用户由于任何原因而无法关闭 区域中的控件，则开发人员可以在 谓词上将属性值设置 为 `false` ，然后将阻止用户关闭该区域内的任何控件。For example, if a developer wants to prevent users from being able to close the controls in a zone for any reason, the developer can set the property value on the verb to `false`, and then users will be prevented from closing any controls within that zone. 默认情况下，禁用的谓词在谓词菜单中呈现时具有视觉提示，如较浅的文本颜色。By default, disabled verbs are rendered in verbs menus with a visual cue such as a lighter text color. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在继承自的派生类中重写属性 。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源代码只显示自定义区域的代码部分和 重写属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 运行示例所需的代码的其余部分位于类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置包含一个图像的 URL 的字符串，该图像在用户界面 (UI) 中表示谓词。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing a URL to an image that represents a verb in the user interface (UI).

value.span: 一个字符串，包含一个图像的 URL。

span.span: A string that contains the URL to an image.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种方法，用于将自定义的可视化表示形式用作默认呈现的替代方法，这通常是一个按钮或超链接。The property provides a way to use a customized visual representation for verbs as an alternative to the default rendering, which is typically a button or a hyperlink. 如果为属性分配 URL，则该图像将显示在谓词菜单 () 或直接在窗 (体中，而不是表示谓词) 的按钮或超链接。If you assign a URL to the property, the image appears in verbs menus (next to the verb) or directly in forms (in place of a button or hyperlink that represents the verb). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在继承自的派生类中重写属性 。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源代码只显示自定义区域的代码部分和 重写属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 运行示例所需的代码的其余部分位于类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. 请注意，示例代码将虚拟图标分配给 属性; 如果您分配了真实图像或图标，该图标将出现在谓词菜单中的谓词旁边。Note that the sample code assigns a fictitious icon to the property; if you assign a real image or icon, it will appear next to the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)]

summary.span: 从用 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 此方法确定上一个页面请求中是否存在任何现有，如果已存在，则将 `savedState` 其还原。This method determines whether there is any existing `savedState` from a previous page request, and if so, restores it. 在还原视图状态的过程中包含谓词的可见性，这是由属性的值决定的 。Included in the process of restoring view state is the verb's visibility, which is determined by the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在用户界面 (UI) 中的谓词的文本标签。

span.span: Gets or sets the text label for a verb that is displayed in the user interface (UI).

value.span: 一个字符串，包含谓词的文本标签。

span.span: A string containing the text label for a verb.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置对象的标签文本 ; 它表示用户在 UI 中的谓词。This property sets the text of the label for a object; it is what represents the verb to users in the UI. 如果开发人员 (可以选择) 为属性赋值 ，则图像或图标表示 UI 中的谓词，在某些情况下 (例如，当谓词通常由按钮或超) 链接呈现时，将显示图像而不是文本标签。If developers (optionally) assign a value to the property, an image or icon represents the verb in the UI, and in certain cases (such as when the verb is normally rendered by a button or hyperlink) the image appears instead of the text label. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在继承自的派生类中重写属性 。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源代码只显示自定义区域的代码部分和 重写属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 运行示例所需的代码的其余部分位于类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. 在浏览器中加载页面后，请注意，分配给 源代码中的属性的值会显示在控件的谓词菜单中 。After you load the page in a browser, note that the value assigned to the property in the source code appears in the verbs menu of the control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原服务器控件的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含服务器控件视图状态信息的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of that contains the server control's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于该 对象不从任何跟踪视图状态的类继承，并且它具有多个属性，这些属性要求在页的多个请求间跟踪视图状态，因此它实现其自己的属性以维护视图状态。Because the object does not inherit from any class that tracks view state, and yet it has a number of properties that require view state to be tracked across multiple requests for the page, it implements its own property to maintain view state.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示谓词对用户是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a verb is visible to users.

value.span: 如果谓词可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the verb is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 谓词通常需要隐藏或显示，具体取决于 Web 部件应用程序的内容。Verbs often need to be hidden or displayed depending on the content of a Web Parts application. 例如，当控件已最小化时，将隐藏最小化谓词，相反，当控件处于正常、非最小化状态时，将隐藏还原谓词。For example, the minimize verb is hidden when a control is already minimized, and conversely, the restore verb is hidden when the control is in its normal, non-minimized state. 其 属性设置为的谓词 `false` 对于用户是隐藏的，但仍呈现在页上，仍可通过编程方式访问，并且仍可完全参与页面和控件生命周期事件。A verb whose property is set to `false` is hidden from users, but is still rendered on a page, can still be accessed programmatically, and still fully participates in page and control life cycle events. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).
